title: If you duoed to get to your rank, please just play support
body:
If we're all plat and you duoed to get to plat while your soloQ elo is lower than silver, please just play support, please.

We don't need a silver mid laner who doesn't know how to ult as Yasuo when the enemies are knocked up. Just be a good support and go 0/10 without depriving the team of a useful late game carry.

Here are the things you'll need to do.

Pick a support with a ranged heal or ranged harass and take random assists.
Don't take the kills from the carries.
Do whatever.
We'd prefer it if you warded, but it's not required.

replies.body: Just the fact you think a support is that unimportant shows where you belong.

Would you rather have a b5 support or a b5 mid laner?

A diamond mid laner can carry a b5 support.

A diamond supp can't carry a b5 mid laner.

I played a game with a diamond support and a bronze adc and they lost. It's more like the support doesn't have enough income to impact a game if the other 4 players won't group with the support or help him out.

A b5 support can:
-stun
-ward
-cc
-tank damage
-bait
-initiate
in a diamond game

A b5 mid laner can:
-feed
in a diamond game

I have never seen a bronze V support do any of those things, except maybe by accident. They definitely do not ward, bait or peel (often i do not see them even _have_ any wards, including sightstone or trinket)

They prefer to use trinket over sightstone, but at least they have CC that doesn't scale with gold so they can still do something even if they're not fed.

They can also be bait if they're 0/10 and the enemy is chasing them and ignoring important objectives.

They can tank damage.

They can initiate using their CC.
I like how you listed steps like people were actually gonna listen

Before you downvote, which of these teams are more likely to lose?

Bronze Mid
Plat ADC
Diamond Top
Diamond JG
Plat Support

or

Bronze Support
Diamond Mid
Diamond Top
Plat ADC
Plat JG
